Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: அடல்தகையும் ஆற்றலும் இல்லெனினும் தானைபடைத்தகையால் பாடு பெறும்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Though destitute of courage to fight and strength (to endure), an army may yet gain renown by the splendour of its appearance.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: An army is drawn up in a magnificent parade formation. Their armor is polished to a mirror shine, their banners are vast and colorful, their marching is perfectly synchronized. The sheer 'splendour of its appearance' ('படைத்தகையால்') is breathtaking.
Layered_Composition.Midground: A subtle, transparent overlay reveals the inner reality of the soldiers: they may be fearful and lack true fighting strength ('அடல் தகையும் ஆற்றலும் இல்'). Their hearts are shown trembling.
Layered_Composition.Background: Despite their inner weakness, onlookers (including enemy spies) are shown to be immensely intimidated and impressed. The army is achieving a certain kind of glory and renown ('பாடு பெறும்') purely through its magnificent presentation and discipline, which projects an illusion of unbeatable power.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Even if an army lacks true fighting strength and courage, it can still gain renown and intimidate foes purely through the splendor and discipline of its appearance.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The contrast between the magnificent exterior and the fearful interior is the key. The splendor is not just decoration; it is a psychological weapon that creates its own form of power and reputation.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Intimidating, splendid, illusory power, disciplined appearance.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: Bright, magnificent, parade-ground lighting. The colors are rich and powerful—gleaming gold, deep reds, polished steel. The inner view of the soldiers' fear is a cool, fearful blue, but it is completely hidden by the outer splendor.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A grand, sweeping panoramic shot that captures the breathtaking scale and perfection of the army's formation.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with a focus on the polished surfaces, intricate banners, and perfect synchronicity.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Bright, spectacular lighting to emphasize the 'splendour' of the army.
